name: src/ll1/_compile.js
_compile
description:
Generates the rows of the predictive parsing table for a grammar.
Corresponds to Algorithm 4.31 in Dragon Book (2006) on page 224.

_first
description: Computes FIRST table for grammar nonterminals.

_follow
description: Computes the FOLLOW table for all nonterminals.

compile

Compiles the predictive parsing table for a grammar.
Corresponds to Algorithm 4.31 in Dragon Book (2006) on page 224.

first
description: Generate FIRST set for any rule given the FIRST sets for the nonterminals.

name: src/util/setaddall.js
setaddall
description:
Adds all elements of an iterable to a set and returns true if the set has
changed.

params.name: iterable
params.description: The iterable of elements to add to the set.

content:
[@aureooms/js-grammar](https://aureooms.github.io/js-grammar)
==

Grammar compilation toolkit for JavaScript. Served with asynchronous goodness.
See [docs](https://aureooms.github.io/js-grammar/index.html).

> :warning: The code needs a ES2015+ polyfill to work (`regeneratorRuntime`),
> for instance [@babel/polyfill](https://babeljs.io/docs/usage/polyfill).

```js
const G = grammar.from( { root , start , eof , productions } ) ;
const parser = ll1.from(G);
```

[![Version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@aureooms/js-grammar.svg)](https://www.npmjs.org/package/@aureooms/js-grammar)

name: ./README.md
package.json

./doc/manual/installation.md
content:
# Installation

Can be managed using
[yarn](https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs),
[npm](https://docs.npmjs.com),
or [jspm](https://jspm.org/docs).


### yarn
```terminal
yarn add @aureooms/js-grammar
```

### npm
```terminal
npm install @aureooms/js-grammar --save
```

### jspm
```terminal
jspm install npm:@aureooms/js-grammar
```
